channel.title: Nathan Craddock
channel.description: Recent content on Nathan Craddock's website

item.title: LuaJIT is more complex than I thought
item.description: Learning the hard way that LuaJIT is much more complicated than Lua...

item.title: macOS doesn't like polling /dev/tty
item.description: macOS does not allow polling /dev/tty. This talks about the issue and some possible workarounds...

item.title: Writing to the macOS clipboard the hard way
item.description: A fun journey through different ways to write to the macOS clipboard from Lua...

item.title: A different approach to fuzzy finding
item.description: I built a new fuzzy finder that does a particularly great job at filtering filepaths. Here is why I built it and what it offers...

item.title: Some thoughts on Zig testing
item.description: I wrote a lot of Zig tests lately, and I wanted to share some thoughts...
